remarks.format: ## Remarks 辨識器設定可以包含字串、 64 位元整數或記憶體位址資料。Recognizer settings can contain string, 64-bit integer, or memory address data. 下表描述會定義 Microsoft 語音 API (SAPI) 的設定為相容的辨識器。The following table describes the settings that are defined for a Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)-compliant recognizer. 下列設定的支援設定每個辨識器必須在相同的範圍。The following settings must have the same range for each recognizer that supports the setting. SAPI 相容的辨識器不需要支援這些設定，而且可支援其他設定。A SAPI-compliant recognizer is not required to support these settings and can support other settings. |名稱Name|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|指定的辨識器 CPU 耗用量。Specifies the recognizer's CPU consumption. 範圍是從 0 到 100 之間。The range is from 0 to 100. 預設值為 50。The default value is 50.| |`ResponseSpeed`|語音辨識器完成辨識作業之前，請指出無回應的模稜兩可的輸入結尾的長度。Indicates the length of silence at the end of unambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation. 範圍是從 0 到 10000 毫秒 (ms)。The range is from 0 to 10,000 milliseconds (ms). 此設定會對應至辨識器的屬性。This setting corresponds to the recognizer's property. 預設值 = 150ms年。Default = 150ms.| |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|語音辨識器完成辨識作業之前，請模稜兩可的輸入結尾指出無回應，以毫秒為單位 （毫秒） 的長度。Indicates the length of silence in milliseconds (ms) at the end of ambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation. 範圍是從 0 至 10,000。The range is from 0 to 10,000ms. 此設定會對應至辨識器的屬性。This setting corresponds to the recognizer's property. 預設值 = 500 毫秒。Default = 500ms.| |`AdaptationOn`|指出的柔和式模型適應是否為 ON (值 = `1`) 或 OFF (值 = `0`)。Indicates whether adaptation of the acoustic model is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`). 預設值是`1`(ON)。The default value is `1` (ON).| |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|指出背景適應是否為 ON (值 = `1`) 或 OFF (值 = `0`)，並將保存在登錄中的設定。Indicates whether background adaptation is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`), and persists the setting in the registry. 預設值是`1`(ON)。The default value is `1` (ON).| 若要傳回其中一個辨識器的設定，請使用方法。To return one of the recognizer's settings, use the method. 除了`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`，使用設定的屬性值方法僅適用於目前的執行個體仍然有效之後將它們還原為其預設設定。With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the methods remain in effect only for the current instance of , after which they revert to their default settings. 您可以修改非語音輸入使用語音辨識的回應方式， ， ，和屬性。You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the , , , and properties.
